title: 服务器提示Mod加载区块导致卡顿
author: Super_SA
txt_content:
[20:18:35] [Server thread/WARN]: Thaumcraft loaded a new chunk [1068, -670] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [1069, -670], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[20:18:35] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[20:18:35] [Server thread/WARN]: Tinkers Alloying Addon loaded a new chunk [1067, -670] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [1068, -670], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[20:18:35] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[20:18:39] [Server thread/WARN]: CustomNPCs loaded a new chunk [1072, -672] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chunk [1073, -671], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[20:18:39] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个原因，https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=797425

尝试更新 log 中提到的 mod ，若仍无效，尝试预加载地图。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Super_SA 发表于 2019-11-3 08:15
可以告诉我如何预加载地图吗
站在某个世界

安装插件 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-608265-1-1.html

设置边界 /wb set 半径

预加载 /wb fill

耐心等待
